Class LanguageAdministrator

java.lang.Object
  org.schwering.evi.conf.LanguageAdministrator
public class LanguageAdministrator
extends java.lang.Object

The language administrator tells the Messages classes when to load.

Field Detail

DEFAULT_LOCALE

public static final java.util.Locale DEFAULT_LOCALE
The default locale. This one is used if no locale is set in user.language system property and no locale is set in the configuration either.

AVAILABLE_LOCALES

public static final java.util.Locale[] AVAILABLE_LOCALES
All available locales.

Method Detail

registerMessagesClass

public static void registerMessagesClass(java.lang.Class c)
Each Messages class should register itself. Then, EVI can load its messages.properties file when it's time to do so.

Parameters:
c - The Messages-class. It must

load

public static void load()
Loads each Messages-class's externalized-strings-file with the locale set in MainConfiguration behind the key app.lang.

getUserLanguage

public static java.util.Locale getUserLanguage()
Returns the Java VM user.language as Locale.

Returns:
A Locale that represents the language set in the system property user.language.
